title: anyone know !
body:
when warring kingdom garen will be available ? 

thanks in advance

replies.body: We're not quite sure at this time when the Warring Kingdoms Garen skin will be back. We do make sure to post any skins that are coming back, as well as any sales coming up on our [**sales page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales).
in about a year. or whenever they decide to put it on sale again. they only sold the skin for a couple of weeks after its release.
omg sad news :( ... anyway thanks alot ^^
